channel.title: Pages on mostlymaths.net
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on mostlymaths.net

item.title: About me
item.description: Welcome! I’m Ruben Berenguel, the mind behind the writing here at mostlymaths.net. I have a PhD in Mathematics and work as a Site Reliability Engineer (Software Engineer) in Google Zurich. All the writing here represents (and has always represented unless explicitly stated in the post) my own views. I have a varied set of interests, that range from reliability and data engineering, management (my previous job) to bespoke shoemaking (a previous job).

item.title: Blog details
item.description: Here are some details of the tools used to build and keep this blog. The engine is the static site generator Hugo Hosted on Github Pages The main header is a Julia set I computed many years ago The font is Reforma 1969 The code font is Monoid The drop caps are from the Byrne font by Nicholas Rougeaux The break decoration font is Nymphette Uses MathJax in some pages Uses D3.
